member.returns: JSON object that represents serialized annotation collection or annotation.

member.name: T:Vintasoft.Imaging.Annotation.Web.Mvc.Controllers.VintasoftAnnotationCollectionApiController
member.summary: API controller that handles HTTP requests from clients and allows to manipulate annotations on server.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Annotation.Web.Mvc.Controllers.VintasoftAnnotationCollectionApiController.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Annotation.Web.Mvc.Controllers.VintasoftAnnotationCollectionApiController.DeserializeAnnotationCollection(Vintasoft.Imaging.Annotation.Web.Mvc.Controllers.BaseAnnotationCollectionRequestParams)
member.summary: Deserializes annotation collection, of specified image, from server.
member.returns: Response that contains annotation collection in JSON format.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Annotation.Web.Mvc.Controllers.VintasoftAnnotationCollectionApiController.SerializeAnnotationCollection(Vintasoft.Imaging.Annotation.Web.Mvc.Controllers.AnnotationCollectionSerializeRequestParams)
member.summary: Serializes annotation collection, of specified image, on server.
member.param: Information about source image and serializing annotation collection.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Annotation.Web.Mvc.Controllers.VintasoftAnnotationCollectionApiController.RemoveAnnotationCollection(Vintasoft.Imaging.Annotation.Web.Mvc.Controllers.BaseAnnotationCollectionRequestParams)
member.summary: Removes the annotation annotation, of specified image, from server.
member.remarks: Method removes file, on server, that contain annotation collection saved in JSON format.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Annotation.Web.Mvc.Controllers.VintasoftAnnotationCollectionApiController.BurnAnnotationCollection(Vintasoft.Imaging.Annotation.Web.Mvc.Controllers.AnnotationCollectionSerializeRequestParams)
member.summary: Burns the specified annotation collection on the specified image.
member.param: Information about source image and annotation collection.
member.remarks: Method loads specified image from file, burns annotations on image and saves modified image back to the source file.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Annotation.Web.Mvc.Controllers.VintasoftAnnotationCollectionApiController.SaveAnnotationCollections(Vintasoft.Imaging.Annotation.Web.Mvc.Controllers.AnnotationCollectionSaveAtFileRequestParams)
member.summary: Saves the specified annotation collections in the specified image file.
member.param: Information about source image file and annotation collections .
member.remarks: Method loads all images from file, adds annotations to each image and saves modified images back to the source file.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Annotation.Web.Mvc.Controllers.VintasoftAnnotationCollectionApiController.GetAnnotationCollectionFromCache(System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Returns cached annotation collection, of specified image, as a JSON string.
member.param: Zero-based index of image in image file.
member.returns: Annotation collection, as JSON string, of specified image.
member.remarks: Cached annotation collection stored as JSON string in directory "~/VintasoftCache/Annotations/{$sessionId}/"

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Annotation.Web.Mvc.Controllers.VintasoftAnnotationCollectionApiController.SaveAnnotationCollectionToCache(System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Saves annotation collection, of specified image, in cache.
member.param: Zero-based index of image in image file.
Annotation collection as a JSON string.
member.remarks: Cached annotation collection stored as JSON string in directory "~/VintasoftCache/Annotations/{$sessionId}/"

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Annotation.Web.Mvc.Controllers.VintasoftAnnotationCollectionApiController.GetEncoder(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the encoder for the specified filename.
member.returns: Encoder that should be used for saving the image to the specified file.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Annotation.Web.Mvc.Controllers.VintasoftAnnotationCollectionApiController.GetFilePath(System.String)
member.summary: Returns path to a file on server.
member.returns: Path to a file on server.
member.remarks: Method converts file URL to file path.

member.summary: Gets or sets the formatter that should be used for serializing/deserializing annotations.
